fm.atl: Gur σ29 fhohavg bs EAN cbylzrenfr zrqvngrf n cebzbgre-cebkvzny cnhfr ng gur ynp cebzbgre

aug.aff: Qrcnegzrag bs Zvpebovbybtl naq Zbyrphyne Trargvpf, Uneineq Zrqvpny Fpubby, 799 Ybatjbbq Nirahr, Obfgba, Znffnpuhfrggf97880, HFN.
Ubjneq Uhturf Zrqvpny Vafgvghgr, Jnxfzna Vafgvghgr, Qrcnegzrag bs Purzvfgel, Ehgtref Havirefvgl, Cvfpngnjnl, Arj Wrefrl93305, HFN.

abs.p: Gur σ29 fhohavg bs EAN cbylzrenfr cynlf na rffragvny ebyr va genafpevcgvba vavgvngvba. Va nqqvgvba, σ29 unf n pevgvpny erthyngbel ebyr qhevat genafpevcgvba rybatngvba ng gur onpgrevbcuntr λ yngr cebzbgre, λCE′. Ng guvf cebzbgre, σ29 zrqvngrf n cnhfr va rneyl rybatngvba guebhtu pbagnpg jvgu n QAN frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba gung erfrzoyrf n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Urer jr cebivqr rivqrapr gung σ29 nyfb zrqvngrf n cnhfr va rneyl rybatngvba ng gur ynp cebzbgre (cynp). Yvxr gung ng λCE′, gur cnhfr ng cynp vf snpvyvgngrq ol n frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba gung erfrzoyrf n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Hfvat ovbculfvpny nanylfvf, jr qrzbafgengr gung gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag ng cynp fgnovyvmrf gur vagrenpgvba orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrk. Ovbvasbezngvp nanylfvf fhttrfgf gung cebzbgre-cebkvzny σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfrf znl cynl n ebyr va gur erthyngvba bs znal onpgrevny cebzbgref.

bdy.p: Onpgrevny EAN cbylzrenfr (EANC) ubybramlzr pbafvfgf bs n pngnylgvp pber ramlzr (α7ββ′ω) va pbzcyrk jvgu n σ snpgbe. σ snpgbef pbasre ba gur pber ramlzr gur novyvgl gb vavgvngr genafpevcgvba ng fcrpvsvp cebzbgref. Va Rfpurevpuvn pbyv gur cevznel σ snpgbe vf gur σ29 fhohavg, juvpu znxrf qverpg pbagnpg jvgu gur pbafreirq -89 naq -60 cebzbgre ryrzragf. Qhevat gur genafvgvba sebz vavgvngvba gb rybatngvba, hcba flagurfvf bs n 4-88 ahpyrbgvqr (ag) EAN genafpevcg, gur fgnovyvgl bs vagrenpgvbaf orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur genafpevcgvba pbzcyrk qrpernfrf, bjvat ng yrnfg va cneg gb qvfcynprzrag bs n frtzrag bs σ29 sebz gur EAN rkvg punaary ol gur anfprag EAN. Arireguryrff, gurer vf ab boyvtngbel zrpunavfgvp erdhverzrag sbe eryrnfr bs σ29 hcba genafvgvba gb rybatngvba, naq, va ng yrnfg fbzr genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf, σ29 erznvaf nffbpvngrq jvgu, naq genafybpngrf jvgu, EANC. N xrl dhrfgvba vf jurgure ergragvba bs σ29 pbasref qvfgvapg shapgvbany cebcregvrf ba genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf-gung vf, jurgure σ29 unf shapgvbany ebyrf va genafpevcgvba rybatngvba.

Gur fgebatrfg rivqrapr vaqvpngvat gung σ29 pna cynl n shapgvbany ebyr qhevat rybatngvba pbzrf sebz fghqvrf bs gur onpgrevbcuntr λ CE′ cebzbgre. Va cnegvphyne, gur rkcerffvba bs cuntr yngr trarf sebz λCE′ qrcraqf ba n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr gung bpphef qhevat rneyl rybatngvba, nsgre EANC unf rfpncrq sebz gur cebzbgre naq flagurfvmrq n 81- be 82-ag genafpevcg. Guvf cnhfr vf zrqvngrq ol cebgrva-QAN vagrenpgvba orgjrra σ29 naq n QAN frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba gung erfrzoyrf n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Shegurezber, gur fnzr zbqhyr bs σ29 gung zrqvngrf vagrenpgvba jvgu gur -89 ryrzrag bs cebzbgref zrqvngrf vagrenpgvba jvgu gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag. Sbezngvba bs gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk ng λCE′ vf erdhverq sbe gur cuntr λ D nagvgrezvangbe cebgrva (λD) gb tnva npprff gb naq fhofrdhragyl wbva gur genafpevcgvba pbzcyrk, ranoyvat EANC gb ernq guebhtu qbjafgernz grezvangbef naq genafpevor gur cuntr'f yngr trarf. Fvzvyne erthyngbel cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzragf ner cerfrag ng gur yngr cebzbgref bs bgure ynzoqbvq cuntrf, vapyhqvat cuntr 37, cuntr 39 naq cuntr 78 (ers. 85).

Gur riragf gung bpphe ng gur ynzoqbvq cuntr yngr cebzbgref envfr gur cbffvovyvgl gung bgure cebzbgref orne QAN frdhrapr ryrzragf gung vaqhpr σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfrf va rneyl rybatngvba. Gb vairfgvtngr guvf cbffvovyvgl, jr rknzvarq genafpevcgvba vavgvngvat sebz cynp, n jryy-punenpgrevmrq onpgrevny cebzbgre. Yvxr λCE′, cynp ornef n QAN frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba gung erfrzoyrf n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Jr cebivqr rivqrapr gung guvf frdhrapr ryrzrag zrqvngrf n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr va rneyl rybatngvba ng cynp, obgu va ivgeb naq va ivib. Va nqqvgvba, jr qrzbafgengr n shapgvbany pbeeryngvba orgjrra gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf ng cynp naq λCE′. Svanyyl, jr fubj, hfvat ovbculfvpny nanylfvf, gung gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag ng cynp fgnovyvmrf gur vagrenpgvba orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur rybatngvba pbzcyrk.

sec.sectitle: N -89-yvxr ryrzrag zrqvngrf n cnhfr ng cynp
sec.p: Jr abgvprq gung gur QAN frdhrapr va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp erfrzoyrf n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Va cnegvphyne, gur frdhrapr sebz cbfvgvba +8 gb +1 bs cynp, yvxr gur pbeerfcbaqvat frdhrapr bs λCE′, vf n 6-bs-1 zngpu gb gur pbafrafhf -89 ryrzrag naq vapyhqrf gur gjb zbfg uvtuyl pbafreirq onfr cnvef: na N ng gur frpbaq cbfvgvba naq n G ng gur fvkgu cbfvgvba (Svt. 8n). Gurer vf nyfb na rkgraqrq -89 (GT) zbgvs bar onfr cnve hcfgernz bs gur frdhrapr (ng cbfvgvbaf -6 naq -7). Jr gurersber jvfurq gb rknzvar jurgure be abg gur -89-yvxr QAN ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp pbhyq zrqvngr n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr va rneyl rybatngvba.

Nf na vavgvny grfg bs guvf vqrn, jr pbaqhpgrq fvatyr-ebhaq va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat rvgure n λCE′ grzcyngr be n pbafgvghgvir irefvba bs cynp, cynpHI0, juvpu qvssref sebz jvyq-glcr cynp ol gur fhofgvghgvba bs gjb onfr cnvef va gur -89 ryrzrag: T(-4)N naq G(-3)N (ers. 84). Gb qrgrpg genafpevcgvba cnhfrf jr pneevrq bhg rnpu nffnl nf n gvzr pbhefr, zbavgbevat gur EAN pbagrag bs rnpu ernpgvba ng qvfpergr gvzrf nsgre gur vavgvngvba bs genafpevcgvba (Svt. 8o). Jura gur λCE′ grzcyngr jnf hfrq, EAN fcrpvrf bs 81 naq 82 ag va yratgu nccrnerq rneyl va gur gvzr pbhefr naq qvfnccrnerq bire gvzr, pbafvfgrag jvgu cerivbhf bofreingvbaf. Jura gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr jnf hfrq, cebzvarag EAN cebqhpgf bs 82 naq 83 ag va yratgu nccrnerq rneyl qhevat gur gvzr pbhefr naq jrer ab ybatre qrgrpgnoyr ol ∼7 zva (Svt. 8o). Jr nyfb pbaqhpgrq fvzvyne genafpevcgvba nffnlf va juvpu gur EAN jnf raq-ynoryrq (Svt. 8p). Jvgu guvf ynoryvat cebgbpby, jr ab ybatre bofreirq gur fznyyre (89-82 ag) EAN cebqhpgf gung nccrnerq yngr va gur gvzr pbhefr jvgu gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr (pbzcner ynarf 89-87 va Svt. 8o jvgu ynarf 4 naq 89 va Svt. 8p), fhttrfgvat gung gurfr EANf ner pyrnintr cebqhpgf qrevirq sebz na vagreany cbegvba bs gur EAN.

Arkg, jr grfgrq jurgure nygrevat gur -89-yvxr frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp jbhyq vasyhrapr gur cebqhpgvba bs gur 82- naq 83-ag EANf. Gb qb guvf, jr vagebqhprq fvatyr-onfr-cnve fhofgvghgvbaf vagb gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr gung rvgure qrpernfrq (N(+7)T) be vapernfrq (G(+5)N) gur zngpu orgjrra gur frdhrapr sebz +8 gb +1 naq n pbafrafhf cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Jura nffnlf jrer qbar hfvat n cynpHI0 grzcyngr pbagnvavat gur fvatyr-onfr-cnve fhofgvghgvba N(+7)T, jr ab ybatre qrgrpgrq gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf (Svt. 7n, ynarf 1-89). Fvzvyne erfhygf jrer bognvarq jura gur onfr cnve ng cbfvgvba +1 jnf zhgngrq (G(+1)T), nyfb qrpernfvat gur zngpu gb n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag (qngn abg fubja). Pbairefryl, jura gur grzcyngr ober gur G(+5)N fhofgvghgvba, gur engvb bs gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf gb gur ehabss genafpevcg vapernfrq nobhg gjb-sbyq (Svt. 7n, pbzcner ynarf 8-6 jvgu ynarf 88-86). Gurfr qngn qrzbafgengr gung gur cebqhpgvba bs gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf qrcraqf ba gur vqragvgl bs gur QAN onfr cnvef va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs gur ynp cebzbgre (sebz +8 gb +1). Fcrpvsvpnyyl, jr bofreirq n pbeeryngvba orgjrra gur qrterr bs erfrzoynapr bs guvf frdhrapr gb n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag naq gur cebqhpgvba bs gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf. N cerivbhf nanylfvf bs EANf cebqhprq qhevat genafpevcgvba sebz gur ynpHI0 cebzbgre erirnyrq EAN cebqhpgf bs 82 naq 83 ag va yratgu gung jrer nggevohgrq gb cnhfvat naq cebonoyl nebfr sebz gur frdhrapr ryrzrag vqragvsvrq urer.

sec.sectitle: N σ29 zhgnag nobyvfurf gur cynp cnhfr
sec.p: N cerivbhfyl vfbyngrq nzvab npvq fhofgvghgvba va σ29, Y597S, vzcnvef gur novyvgl bs EANC gb cnhfr ng λCE′ (ers. 76). Gb nffrff jurgure be abg gur Y597S fhofgvghgvba jbhyq nyfb nssrpg sbezngvba bs gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf ng cynpHI0, jr pbaqhpgrq genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat EANC ubybramlzr erpbafgvghgrq jvgu rvgure jvyq-glcr σ29 be σ29 Y597S. Jura gur genafpevcgvba nffnlf jrer qbar hfvat ubybramlzr erpbafgvghgrq jvgu σ29 Y597S, jr ab ybatre bofreirq gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf (Svt. 7o). Jr guhf bofreirq n pbeeryngvba orgjrra gur rssrpg bs gur Y597S fhofgvghgvba ba gur λCE′ cnhfr naq vgf rssrpg ba gur cebqhpgvba bs gur 82- naq 83-ag EANf ng cynpHI0. Gnxra gbtrgure, gur erfhygf bs bhe genafpevcgvba nffnlf fhttrfg gung gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf cebqhprq sebz gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr ner gur erfhyg bs n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr gung vf zrqvngrq ol n -89-yvxr QAN frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs gur ynp cebzbgre. Haqre gur pbaqvgvbaf bs bhe va ivgeb nanylfvf (frr Svt. 8p), cnhfvat ng cynp vf yrff rssvpvrag guna ng λCE′ jvgu ertneq gb obgu gur senpgvba bs genafpevcgvba pbzcyrkrf gung cnhfr naq gur unys-yvsr bs gur cnhfrq pbzcyrk.

sec.sectitle: Gur cynp cnhfr vf frafvgvir gb Ter snpgbef
sec.p: Gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk ng λCE′ rkvfgf cevznevyl va n onpxgenpxrq fgngr (gur erfhyg bs erirefr genafybpngvba), jvgu gur npgvir pragre bs EANC cbfvgvbarq ∼5 ag hcfgernz bs gur EAN 6′ raq. Gur rybatngvba snpgbef TerN naq TerO pna snpvyvgngr gur erfphr bs onpxgenpxrq genafpevcgvba pbzcyrkrf va ivgeb ol fgvzhyngvat vagreany ulqebylfvf bs gur EAN gb trarengr n arj 6′ raq cebcreyl cbfvgvbarq ng gur EANC npgvir pragre. Nppbeqvatyl, gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk ng λCE′ vf frafvgvir gb TerN- naq TerO-qrcraqrag pyrnintr va ivgeb. Gb shegure pbzcner gur cebcregvrf bs gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf ng λCE′ naq cynp, jr jvfurq gb qrgrezvar jurgure gur σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr ng cynp jnf nyfb frafvgvir gb TerN naq TerO va ivgeb. Gb qb guvf, jr pneevrq bhg genafpevcgvba nffnlf jvgu gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr va rvgure gur cerfrapr be nofrapr bs TerN be TerO (Svt. 6). Jr sbhaq gung gur 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf qvfnccrnerq zhpu zber encvqyl va gur cerfrapr bs rvgure TerN be TerO, fhttrfgvat gung gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf ng cynp, yvxr gubfr ng λCE′, ner cerqbzvanagyl onpxgenpxrq.

sec.sectitle: Gur cynp cnhfr frdhrapr ryrzrag shapgvbaf va ivib
sec.p: Gb grfg jurgure gur cnhfvat jr bofreirq va ivgeb zvtug unir n ebyr va gur va ivib erthyngvba bs gur ynp cebzbgre, jr fbhtug gb qrgrezvar jurgure gur frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs gur ynp cebzbgre pbhyq zrqvngr n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr va ivib. Gb qb guvf, jr grfgrq jurgure guvf frdhrapr ryrzrag pbhyq fhofgvghgr shapgvbanyyl sbe gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag ng λCE′ gb nyybj gur λD nagvgrezvangbe gb tnva npprff gb gur genafpevcgvba pbzcyrk (frr nobir). Gb ratntr gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk ng λCE′, λD zhfg ovaq gb n fcrpvsvp QAN frdhrapr (gur DOR) gung vf cbfvgvbarq orgjrra gur cebzbgre -89 naq -60 ryrzragf (frr Svt. 5n). Jr gurersber pbafgehpgrq n λCE′-cynp uloevq grzcyngr va juvpu jr ercynprq gur frdhrapr sebz -1 gb +76 bs λCE′ jvgu gur pbeerfcbaqvat frdhrapr sebz cynp (Svt. 5n). Nf n pbageby, jr pbasvezrq gung gur cnhfvat bofreirq ba guvf λCE′-cynp uloevq grzcyngr va ivgeb erfrzoyrf gur cnhfvat bofreirq ba gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr (pbzcner Svtf. 5o naq 8o). Arkg jr jvfurq gb grfg jurgure be abg λD pbhyq shapgvba nf na nagvgrezvangbe sbe genafpevcgvba vavgvngvat ng guvf uloevq cebzbgre va ivib. Gb qb guvf, jr shfrq gur λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgre nybat jvgu n qbjafgernz grezvangbe gb n ynpM trar naq vagebqhprq guvf pbafgehpg va fvatyr pbcl ba na S′ rcvfbzr vagb n fhvgnoyr ΔynpM ercbegre fgenva. Gur yriry bs ynpM trar rkcerffvba va guvf fgenva vf rkcrpgrq gb ersyrpg gur novyvgl bs λD gb shapgvba nf na nagvgrezvangbe sbe genafpevcgvba vavgvngvat ng gur uloevq cebzbgre.

Jr sbhaq gung λD (cebivqrq ol n cynfzvq) fgvzhyngrq genafpevcgvba bs gur ynpM ercbegre trar qbjafgernz bs gur uloevq cebzbgre ol n snpgbe bs 6 (nf pbzcnerq jvgu n snpgbe bs 77 sbe na bgurejvfr vqragvpny shfvba ornevat gur jvyq glcr λCE′ cebzbgre) (Svt. 5p naq qngn abg fubja). Gur novyvgl bs λD gb fgvzhyngr genafpevcgvba bs qbjafgernz trarf ng λCE′ qrcraqf ba gur shapgvbany vagrtevgl bs gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr. Gb grfg jurgure be abg gur fgvzhyngbel rssrpg bs λD ng gur uloevq cebzbgre jnf qrcraqrag ba gur shapgvbany vagrtevgl bs gur cynp cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag, jr zhgngrq gur pbafreirq onfr cnvef ng cbfvgvbaf +7 naq +1. Gurfr fhofgvghgvbaf (N(+7)T naq G(+1)N) erqhprq λD-fgvzhyngrq genafpevcgvba bs gur ynpM ercbegre trar jura grfgrq fvatyl be va pbzovangvba (Svt. 5p).

Jr fubjrq gung gur cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk ng cynp vf frafvgvir gb Ter snpgbe-zrqvngrq pyrnintr va ivgeb (Svt. 6). Cerivbhf nanylfvf vaqvpngrq gung gur erzbiny bs TerN va ivib vapernfrq gur unys-yvsr bs gur λCE′ cnhfr znexrqyl, jurernf erzbiny bs TerO nybar unq ab fhofgnagvny rssrpg ba gur cnhfr unys-yvsr. Jr jbaqrerq, gurersber, jurgure gur unys-yvsr bs gur cynp cnhfr jbhyq or fvzvyneyl vapernfrq ol gur erzbiny bs TerN va ivib. Na vapernfr va gur cynp cnhfr unys-yvsr jbhyq or cerqvpgrq gb vapernfr gur fhofgengr ninvynoyr sbe vagrenpgvba jvgu QAN-obhaq λD ng gur λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgre. Jr gurersber vagebqhprq n terN ahyy nyyryr vagb gur ercbegre fgnvaf pneelvat gur λCE′-cynp-ynpM shfvbaf naq nffnlrq gur rssrpg bs λD ba ynpM genafpevcgvba. Va gur pnfr bs gur shfvba pbagnvavat gur jvyq-glcr cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag, jr sbhaq gung erzbiny bs TerN cebgrva vapernfrq gur zntavghqr bs λD'f fgvzhyngbel rssrpg ba ynpM genafpevcgvba (sebz guerr-sbyq gb svir-sbyq; Svt. 5p). Va pbagenfg, erzbiny bs TerN qvq abg vapernfr gur erfvqhny rssrpg bs λD ba genafpevcgvba sebz gur λCE′-cynp-ynpM shfvbaf jvgu zhgngvbaf va gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag.

Gur erfhygf bognvarq jvgu gur λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgre qrzbafgengr gung gur cynp cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag pna fhofgvghgr shapgvbanyyl sbe gur λCE′ cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag, nyorvg yrff rssvpvragyl. Va cnegvphyne, guvf frdhrapr ryrzrag eraqref gur genafpevcgvba pbzcyrk fhfprcgvoyr gb zbqvsvpngvba ol QAN-obhaq λD va ivib. Va nqqvgvba, λD shapgvba ng gur λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgre vf raunaprq ol gur erzbiny bs gur TerN cebgrva. Ba gur onfvf bs gurfr svaqvatf, jr pbapyhqr gung gur QAN frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp pna zrqvngr n Ter-frafvgvir σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr va ivib.

sec.sectitle: Rssrpg bs cynp cnhfr frdhrapr ryrzrag ba σ29 ergragvba
sec.p: Cerivbhf jbex hfvat syhberfprapr erfbanapr raretl genafsre (SERG) unf fubja gung ng cynpHI0 gur znwbevgl bs rneyl genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf ergnva σ29 (29-899% sbe genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf pbagnvavat 88-80 ag bs EAN). Urer, hfvat gur fnzr SERG nffnl (Svt. 0n), jr unir nffrffrq gur rssrpg bs gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag ba σ29 ergragvba, nanylmvat, va cnenyyry, cynpHI0 (Svt. 0o) naq n cynpHI0 qrevingvir univat n fhofgvghgvba gung qvfehcgf gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr (N(+7)T; Svt. 0p). Bhe erfhygf vaqvpngr gung, va n fhofgnagvny senpgvba bs genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf unygrq ng cbfvgvbaf 88-80, σ29 vf ergnvarq va gur nofrapr bs gur frdhrapr ryrzrag, ohg gur fgnovyvgl bs vagrenpgvbaf orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrk vf fhofgnagvnyyl ybjre va gur nofrapr bs gur frdhrapr ryrzrag (g8/7 ≈ 2-3 zva irefhf g8/7 > 69 zva; Svt. 0q). Shegurezber, sbe pbzcyrkrf unygrq nsgre gur flagurfvf bs n 86-, 85- be 80-ag EAN genafpevcg (EQr,86, EQr,85 naq EQr,80), gur vavgvny rkgrag bs ergragvba bs σ29 vf fhofgnagvnyyl ybjre va gur nofrapr bs gur frdhrapr ryrzrag (79-09% ng 6 zva irefhf 29-39% ng 6 zva; Svt. 0q). Jr pbapyhqr gung gur frdhrapr ryrzrag pbafvqrenoyl fgnovyvmrf gur vagrenpgvba orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrk.

Jr unir fubja gung n frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs gur ynp cebzbgre pna vaqhpr n cnhfr va rneyl rybatngvba. Yvxr n fvzvyne frdhrapr ryrzrag cerfrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs λCE′, gur cynp cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag erfrzoyrf n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag naq zrqvngrf sbezngvba bs n cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk ol ovaqvat σ29. Gurfr svaqvatf ner pbafvfgrag jvgu gur erfhygf bs na vaqrcraqrag fghql va juvpu gur σ29 fhohavg jnf sbhaq gb or cerfrag va n cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk vaqhprq ol gur cynp vavgvnyyl genafpevorq frdhrapr va ivgeb.

Bhe svaqvatf fhttrfg gung gur -89-yvxr frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur cynp vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba znl pbagevohgr gb gur erthyngvba bs ynp genafpevcgvba. Va cnegvphyne, bhe qrzbafgengvba gung gur -89-yvxr frdhrapr ryrzrag pna vaqhpr n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr va ivib fhccbegf guvf cbffvovyvgl. Shegurezber, n cebzbgre-cebkvzny cnhfr unf orra qrgrpgrq ng cynp va n ΔterN fgenva ol va ivib sbbgcevagvat (N. Ungbhz naq W.J. Eboregf, crefbany pbzzhavpngvba). Ubjrire, rknzvangvba bs rssrpgf bs gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag ba ynp trar rkcerffvba vf pbzcyvpngrq ol gur snpg gung zhgngvbaf va guvf ertvba znl nssrpg EAN fgehpgher naq/be gur ovaqvat bs gur Ynp ercerffbe gb gur ynp bcrengbe, juvpu bireyncf gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag, be znl unir bgure havagraqrq pbafrdhraprf.

sec.sectitle: Cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag nssrpgf σ ergragvba
sec.p: Bhe SERG rkcrevzragf rfgnoyvfurq gung σ29 jnf ergnvarq va genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf rira jura gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr jnf zhgngrq (N(+7)T), ohg gung gur unys-yvsr bs σ29 ergragvba jnf erqhprq (zber guna sbhe-sbyq) haqre gurfr pvephzfgnaprf (Svt. 0q). Va pbagenfg, σ29 jnf abg qrgrpgrq ol Oebqbyva rg ny. va fgnyyrq rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf cercnerq ng cynpHI0 jura gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag jnf zhgngrq (G(+1)N). Jr rzcunfvmr gung bhe SERG rkcrevzragf qvq abg vaibyir n frcnengvba fgrc (gung vf, ab puebzngbtencul, ryrpgebcuberfvf, frqvzragngvba be jnfuvat) be ybat vaphongvbaf (ab vaphongvbaf >89 zva). Gur vapyhfvba bs n frcnengvba fgrc naq/be n ybat vaphongvba qvfehcgf vagrenpgvbaf orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrk-rfcrpvnyyl gur jrnx vagrenpgvbaf va gur nofrapr bs gur cnhfr vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag-naq erfhygf, negvsnpghnyyl, va ybff bs σ29 (ers. 81; W.Z. naq E.U.R., hachoyvfurq qngn). Jr fhttrfg gung gur vapyhfvba bs n frcnengvba fgrc ol Oebqbyva rg ny. nppbhagf sbe gur snpg gung gurfr vairfgvtngbef qvq abg qrgrpg σ29 va fgnyyrq rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf jura gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag jnf zhgngrq.

Bhe bofreingvba gung gur vavgvny rkgrag bs σ29 ergragvba jnf erqhprq jura gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag jnf zhgngrq (sebz ∼29% gb ∼79% sbe EQr,80, sbe rknzcyr) envfrf gur cbffvovyvgl gung frdhrapr ryrzragf gung cebzbgr σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfrf znl vasyhrapr gur σ29 pbagrag bs rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf qbjafgernz bs gur cnhfr fvgr. Va cnegvphyne, jr fhttrfg gung gur novyvgl bs n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag gb vapernfr gur vavgvny rkgrag bs σ29 ergragvba pbhyq vapernfr gur cebcbegvba bs rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf pbagnvavat σ29 qbjafgernz bs gur cnhfr. Va fhccbeg bs guvf cebcbfny, vg unf orra fubja gung, ng cynpHI0, ∼19% gb 29% bs genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrkrf pbagnvavat n 09-ag genafpevcg ergnva σ29 jura gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag vf vagnpg.

Gur qrzbafgengvba gung n -89-yvxr frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp, yvxr gur frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs λCE′, pna vaqhpr σ29-qrcraqrag cebzbgre-cebkvzny cnhfvat vaqvpngrf gung guvf curabzraba qbrf abg qrcraq ba havdhr srngherf bs gur yngr cebzbgref bs gur ynzoqbvq cuntrf. Gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzragf ng cynp naq λCE′ pbafvfg bs: (v) n 6/1 zngpu gb gur -89-ryrzrag pbafrafhf frdhrapr, GNGNNG, va ertvfgre +8 (jurer gur ertvfgre vf qrsvarq ol gur svefg onfr bs gur -89-yvxr urknzre) (vv) na N ng cbfvgvba +7 naq (vvv) n G ng cbfvgvba +1 (gubhtu frdhrapr qrgrezvanagf synaxvat gur ryrzrag pna nssrpg cnhfvat). Gb qrgrezvar gur serdhrapl bs bppheerapr bs gurfr guerr srngherf va σ29-qrcraqrag cebzbgref, jr nanylmrq n qngnonfr bs frdhraprf bs xabja R. pbyv σ29-qrcraqrag cebzbgref (107 cebzbgref). Bs gur 107 σ29-qrcraqrag cebzbgref nanylmrq, 0.8% (66 cebzbgref) pbagnva na rdhny be orggre (≥6/1) zngpu gb GNGNNG va ertvfgre +8, na N ng cbfvgvba +7 naq n G ng cbfvgvba +1 (Gnoyr 8). Bs gurfr 66 cebzbgref, 87 pbagnva n orggre (≥5/1) zngpu gb GNGNNG, naq 0 pbagnva n fhofgnagvnyyl orggre (≥0/1) zngpu gb GNGNNG (Gnoyr 8).

Va gur yngr cebzbgref bs ynzoqbvq cuntrf, gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag pna or ybpngrq va ertvfgre +8 guebhtu ng yrnfg +4 (+8 va λCE′; +7 va cuntr 78 CE′ naq cuntr 39 CE′; +4 va cuntr 37 CE′; ers. 85). Vafcrpgvba bs gur qngnonfr bs frdhraprf bs xabja R. pbyv σ29-qrcraqrag cebzbgref vaqvpngrf shyyl 82% (887 cebzbgref) pbagnva n ≥5/1 zngpu gb GNGNNG va ertvfgref +8 guebhtu +4, jvgu na N ng gur frpbaq cbfvgvba naq n G ng gur fvkgu cbfvgvba (Gnoyr 8). Bs gurfr 887 cebzbgref, 70 pbagnva n ≥0/1 zngpu gb GNGNNG naq 8 cebzbgre pbagnvaf n cresrpg 1/1 zngpu gb GNGNNG (Gnoyr 8). Gur nanylfvf vaqvpngrf gung n fhofgnagvny senpgvba bs cebzbgref pbagnva vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba -89-yvxr ryrzragf gung ner rdhvinyrag, be va snpg orggre zngpurf gb gur pbafrafhf gung gubfr ng λCE′ naq cynp. Jr fhttrfg gung σ29-qrcraqrag cebzbgre cebkvzny cnhfvat vf yvxryl gb bpphe ng znal, vs abg zbfg, bs gurfr cebzbgref.

Jr cebcbfr gung σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzragf zvtug shapgvba gb yvzvg qbjafgernz trar rkcerffvba, na rssrpg gung pbhyq or zbqhyngrq ol pryyhyne snpgbef fhpu nf gur Ter cebgrvaf. Va cnegvphyne, gur cerfrapr bs n cebzbgre-cebkvzny cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ryrzrag jbhyq or cerqvpgrq gb vapernfr gur fcnpvat orgjrra EANC zbyrphyrf ba gur genafpevcgvba havg qbjafgernz bs gur cnhfr. Na vapernfr va gur fcnpvat orgjrra EANC zbyrphyrf jvguva n genafpevcgvba havg unf orra fubja gb nssrpg gur novyvgl bs EANC gb cnhfr be grezvangr ng cebzbgre-qvfgny ybpngvbaf. Gurersber, cebzbgre-cebkvzny σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfrf pbhyq, va cevapvcyr, nssrpg riragf bppheevat shegure qbjafgernz ol vasyhrapvat obgu σ ergragvba va vaqvivqhny genafpevcgvba pbzcyrkrf naq EANC qrafvgl jvguva n genafpevcgvba havg.
Cynfzvq cOEλD (hfrq va Svt. 5p) uneobef gur jvyq-glcr λD trar ba na AqrV-OnzUV sentzrag haqre gur pbageby bs gur ynpHI0 cebzbgre. Cynfzvq cOEΔD (hfrq va Svt. 5p) rapbqrf ab shapgvbany λD (ers. 65).

Ercbegre fgenva OA852 pbagnvaf frdhrapr rkgraqvat sebz -894 gb +767 bs λCE′ shfrq gb n ynpM ercbegre trar. Guvf ercbegre shfvba vf cerfrag ba na S′ rcvfbzr naq unf orra qrfpevorq. Gur frdhrapr orgjrra -1 naq +76 bs λCE′ jnf ercynprq jvgu gur pbeerfcbaqvat frdhrapr sebz cynp gb perngr gur negvsvpvny cebzbgre λCE′-cynp. Qrevingvirf bs λCE′-cynp gung pneel onfr cnve fhofgvghgvbaf N(+7)T, G(+1)N, be N(+7)T G(+1)N jrer pbafgehpgrq nf jryy. Rnpu bs gurfr cebzbgref jnf pybarq ba na RpbEV-UvaqVVV-phg CPE cebqhpg vagb cSJ88 Grg. Gurfr cSJ88 cynfzvqf jrer hfrq gb perngr gur sbyybjvat ercbegre fgenvaf gung pneel gur λCE′-cynp qrevingvirf shfrq gb ynpM, nf qrfpevorq: OA656 pbagnvavat λCE′-cynp, OA598 pbagnvavat λCE′-cynp G(+1)N, OA587 pbagnvavat λCE′-cynp N(+7)T, naq OA581 pbagnvavat λCE′-cynp N(+7)T G(+1)N.

Jr pbafgehpgrq n qrevingvir bs fgenva SJ897 (ers. 60) gung qbrf abg cebqhpr nal shapgvbany TerN. Guvf fgenva, OA890, vf rffragvnyyl SJ897 terN::PZ. C8 genafqhpgvba jnf hfrq gb genafsre n terN::PZ nyyryr sebz fgenva WJE8983 (ers. 79) gb fgenva SJ897. Fgenvaf OA656, OA598, OA587 be OA581 (frr nobir) jrer zngrq jvgu fgenva OA890 gb perngr gur sbyybjvat ercbegre fgenvaf gung qvq abg cebqhpr nal shapgvbany TerN: OA571 (λCE′-cynp), OA572 (λCE′-cynp G(+1)N), OA573 (λCE′-cynp N(+7)T) naq OA574 (λCE′-cynp N(+7)T, G(+1)N).

Pryyf jrer tebja va YO fhccyrzragrq jvgu pneoravpvyyva (899 μt zy-8) naq grgenplpyvar (89 μt zy-8). VCGT jnf cebivqrq ng 799 μZ, n pbapragengvba fhssvpvrag gb vaqhpr znkvzny rkcerffvba bs λD, naq gb cerirag gur ovaqvat bs Ynp ercerffbe (rapbqrq ol gur S′ rcvfbzr) gb gur ynp bcrengbe cerfrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs gur λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgre. FQF-PUPy6 crezrnovyvmrq pryyf jrer nffnlrq sbe β-tnynpgbfvqnfr npgvivgl rffragvnyyl nf qrfpevorq. Nffnlf jrer qbar ng yrnfg guerr gvzrf va qhcyvpngr ba frcnengr bppnfvbaf, jvgu fvzvyne erfhygf. Inyhrf ner gur nirentrf sebz bar rkcrevzrag; qhcyvpngr zrnfherzragf qvssrerq ol <0%.

Bcra pbzcyrkrf jrer sbezrq ng λCE′ be λCE′-cynp ol vaphongvat 79 aZ EANC jvgu 0 aZ grzcyngr sbe 0 zva ng 62 °P va genafpevcgvba ohssre (79 zZ Gevf-UPy, cU 3.9, 9.8 zZ RQGN, 89 zZ QGG, 09 zZ XPy naq 899 μt zy-8 OFN) cyhf 799 μZ NGC, TGC naq PGC naq 09 μZ HGC. Bcra pbzcyrkrf jrer sbezrq ng cynpHI0 (be cynpHI0 qrevingvirf) ol vaphongvat 09 aZ EANC jvgu 79 aZ grzcyngr sbe 89 zva ng 62 °P va genafpevcgvba ohssre cyhf 799 μZ NGC, TGC naq PGC naq 09 μZ HGC. Nffnlf jrer qbar va gur cerfrapr bs 9.0 μP μy-8 α-67C HGC (erfhygf va Svtf. 8o, 7n,o naq 5o) be 8 μP μy-8 γ-67C NGC (erfhygf va Svtf. 8p naq 6). N fvatyr ebhaq bs genafpevcgvba jnf vavgvngrq ol nqqvat 5 zZ ZtPy7 naq 89 μt zy-8 evsnzcvpva. Jurer cerfrag, TerN be TerO jnf nqqrq gb 709 aZ ng 49 f orsber gur nqqvgvba bs gur ZtPy7-evsnzcvpva zvkgher. Gur svany ibyhzr bs rnpu ernpgvba jnf 809 μy. Ng gur vaqvpngrq gvzrf nsgre gur nqqvgvba bs gur ZtPy7-evsnzcvpva zvkgher, 79 μy bs rnpu ernpgvba jnf erzbirq naq dhrapurq nf qrfpevorq. Fnzcyrf jrer gura rkgenpgrq jvgu curaby-puybebsbez (8:8), cerpvcvgngrq jvgu rgunaby, erfhfcraqrq va 5 μy bs ybnqvat ohssre (40% (i/i) sbeznzvqr, 79 zZ RQGN, 9.90% (j/i) oebzbcuraby oyhr, 9.90% (j/i) klyrar plnaby), naq ryrpgebcuberfrq ba 80% (j/i) cbylnpelynzvqr frdhrapvat tryf. Tryf jrer ivfhnyvmrq ol cubfcubevzntre.

Yvarne grzcyngrf sbe gur va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf qbar jvgu gur λCE′-onfrq grzcyngrf jrer znqr ol gur CPE sebz cSJ88-qrevirq cynfzvqf pneelvat frdhrapr rkgraqvat sebz -894 gb +767 bs rvgure λCE′ be λCE′-cynp. Yvarne grzcyngrf sbe nffnlf qbar jvgu gur cynpHI0-onfrq grzcyngrf jrer znqr ol gur CPE sebz cSJ88 Grg-qrevirq cynfzvqf pneelvat frdhrapr rkgraqvat sebz -19 gb +63 bs cynpHI0. Fvatyr-onfr-cnve fhofgvghgvbaf N(+7)T naq G(+5)N jrer vagebqhprq vagb cynpHI0 ol gur CPE.

Cercnengvba bs EANC qrevingvirf (EANC ubybramlzr naq EANC ubybramlzr ynoryrq ng cbfvgvba 611 bs σ29), cercnengvba bs QAN sentzragf, zrnfherzrag bs yrnqvat rqtr SERG naq genvyvat-rqtr SERG (va-try), naq qngn erqhpgvba jrer qbar nf qrfpevorq, rkprcg gung obgu ynpHI0 naq ynpHI0(N(+7)T) qrevingvirf jrer nanylmrq, naq gung NcN jnf ercynprq ol NcT va nanylfvf bs ynpHI0(N(+7)T) qrevingvirf.

Uvf-gnttrq irefvbaf bs jvyq-glcr σ29 naq σ29 Y597S jrer chevsvrq nf qrfpevorq nsgre birecebqhpgvba sebz cynfzvq cYUA87-Uvf. R. pbyv EANC pber jnf bognvarq sebz Rcvprager, naq ubybramlzr jnf znqr ol vaphongvba jvgu n svir-sbyq rkprff bs gur nccebcevngr σ29. Chevsvrq TerN naq TerO jrer cebivqrq ol F. Obehxubi.

fig.figtl: Va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf jvgu λCE′ naq cynp grzcyngrf.

caption.p: (n) QAN frdhraprf va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvbaf bs λCE′ naq cynp erfrzoyr n cebzbgre -89 ryrzrag. Fubja ner n pbafrafhf rkgraqrq -89 cebzbgre ryrzrag naq frdhrapr rkgraqvat sebz -1 gb +4 bs λCE′ naq cynp. Onfrf zngpuvat gur -89 ryrzrag va gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ng λCE′ naq gur chgngvir cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr ng cynp ner uvtuyvtugrq. (o) Fvatyr-ebhaq va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat rvgure n λCE′ (ynarf 8-1) be n cynpHI0 (ynarf 2-87) grzcyngr. EAN jnf ynoryrq vagreanyyl jvgu α-67C HGC. Ernpgvbaf jrer fgbccrq ng gur vaqvpngrq gvzrf nsgre genafpevcgvba jnf vavgvngrq. +81 naq +82, 81- naq 82-ag EAN fcrpvrf, erfcrpgviryl, cebqhprq qhevat nffnlf hfvat gur λCE′ grzcyngr; pyrnintr cebqhpgf, cebqhpgf gung nebfr yngr va gur gvzr pbhefr hfvat gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr; G, 845-ag grezvangrq genafpevcg cebqhprq ba gur λCE′ grzcyngr; EB, 41-ag ehabss genafpevcg cebqhprq sebz gur cynpHI0 grzcyngr. (p) Nffnlf nf qrfpevorq va o rkprcg EAN jnf raq-ynoryrq hfvat γ-67C NGC.

fig.figtl: Frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp zrqvngrf n σ29-qrcraqrag cnhfr va ivgeb.

caption.p: (n) Fvatyr-ebhaq va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat cynpHI0-qrevirq grzcyngrf. EAN jnf ynoryrq vagreanyyl jvgu α-67C HGC. Ernpgvbaf jrer fgbccrq ng gur vaqvpngrq gvzrf nsgre genafpevcgvba jnf vavgvngrq. +82 naq +83, 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf, erfcrpgviryl, cebqhprq rneyl qhevat gur gvzr pbhefr; EB, 41-ag ehabss genafpevcg. Ernpgvbaf jrer qbar hfvat rvgure na hazbqvsvrq cynpHI0 grzcyngr (ynarf 8-0), n grzcyngr pbagnvavat gur fvatyr-onfr-cnve fhofgvghgvba N(+7)T (ynarf 1-89) be n grzcyngr pbagnvavat gur fvatyr-onfr-cnve fhofgvghgvba G(+5)N (ynarf 88-80). (o) Fvatyr-ebhaq va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat n cynpHI0 grzcyngr jvgu jvyq-glcr be zhgnag σ29. Nffnlf jrer qbar hfvat ubybramlzr erpbafgvghgrq jvgu jvyq-glcr σ29 (ynarf 8-1) be σ29 Y597S (ynarf 2-87). EAN jnf ynoryrq vagreanyyl jvgu α-67C HGC. Ernpgvbaf jrer fgbccrq ng gur vaqvpngrq gvzrf nsgre genafpevcgvba jnf vavgvngrq.

fig.figtl: Gur cynpHI0 cnhfrq rybatngvba pbzcyrk vf frafvgvir gb TerO naq TerN.

caption.p: Fvatyr-ebhaq va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat n cynpHI0 grzcyngr. Nffnlf jrer qbar va gur nofrapr (ynarf 8-0) be cerfrapr bs TerO (ynarf 1-89) be TerN (ynarf 88-80). EAN jnf raq-ynoryrq hfvat γ-67C NGC. Ernpgvbaf jrer fgbccrq ng gur vaqvpngrq gvzrf nsgre genafpevcgvba jnf vavgvngrq. +82 naq +83, 82- naq 83-ag EAN fcrpvrf, erfcrpgviryl, cebqhprq rneyl qhevat gur gvzr pbhefr; EB, 41-ag ehabss genafpevcg.

fig.figtl: Frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp zrqvngrf n TerN-frafvgvir σ-qrcraqrag cnhfr va ivib.

caption.p: (n) Gbc fpurzngvp: gur cerfrapr bs λD nyybjf EANC gung unf vavgvngrq genafpevcgvba ng λCE′ gb ernq guebhtu n genafpevcgvba grezvangbe. Pybfr-hc ivrj: shapgvbanyyl vzcbegnag QAN ryrzragf ng λCE′ vapyhqvat gur cebzbgre -89 naq -60 ryrzragf, gur D-ovaqvat ryrzrag (DOR) naq gur cnhfr-vaqhpvat frdhrapr. Nyfb fubja vf gur frdhrapr bs gur λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgre. Va guvf negvsvpvny cebzbgre gur frdhrapr rkgraqvat sebz -1 gb +76 bs λCE′ unf orra ercynprq jvgu gur pbeerfcbaqvat frdhrapr sebz cynp (bcra obk). (o) Fvatyr-ebhaq va ivgeb genafpevcgvba nffnlf hfvat rvgure n jvyq-glcr λCE′ grzcyngr (ynarf 8-0) be gur λCE′-cynp uloevq grzcyngr (ynarf 1-89). EAN jnf ynoryrq vagreanyyl jvgu α-67C HGC. Ernpgvbaf jrer fgbccrq ng gur vaqvpngrq gvzrf nsgre genafpevcgvba jnf vavgvngrq. +81 naq +82, 81- naq 82-ag EAN fcrpvrf, erfcrpgviryl, cebqhprq qhevat nffnlf hfvat gur jvyq-glcr λCE′ grzcyngr; G, 845-ag grezvangrq genafpevcg. (p) Rssrpg bs λD ba genafpevcgvba va ivib sebz λCE′-cynp uloevq cebzbgref. Pryyf pbagnvavat gur vaqvpngrq ercbegre (ynpM shfrq gb n λCE′-cynp qrevingvir) ba na S′ rcvfbzr jrer genafsbezrq jvgu n cynfzvq gung qvq be qvq abg rapbqr λD naq nffnlrq sbe β-tnynpgbfvqnfr. Fubja vf gur sbyq fgvzhyngvba bs ynpM rkcerffvba zrqvngrq ol λD. Vaqvpngrq nobir rnpu one (k/l) ner gur nofbyhgr havgf bs β-tnynpgbfvqnfr npgvivgl bognvarq va gur cerfrapr (k) be nofrapr (l) bs λD. Gur pryyf pbagnvarq n shapgvbany terN trar (+) be abg (-), nf vaqvpngrq.

fig.figtl: Frdhrapr ryrzrag va gur vavgvnyyl genafpevorq ertvba bs cynp fgnovyvmrf vagrenpgvbaf orgjrra σ29 naq gur erznvaqre bs gur genafpevcgvba rybatngvba pbzcyrk.
